main.name: Hafiz Muhammad Waqar Ali
main.bio: Myself Hafiz Muhammad Waqar Ali a Front End Developer. I have Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science from The Islamia University of Bahawalpur. Also, I have more than 1 year of experience in Front End React Development. I describe myself as someone who's persistent, a quick learner, and loves problem-solving by using single and scalable solutions. I am very proficient in React and React-Redux. I have done many major projects in React Redux Js and many minor projects in JavaScript. Also, make my Final Year project an E-Commerce website using React Js, ReduxJs, and Next Js. I am very passionate about what I do and, It is important to me to provide exceptional front-end development service by giving personal attention to my clients.

work.title: Front-End React Developer
work.description: Work as a front-end react developer on control panel and dashboard panel for catch Taxi at Builtin Soft Tech. Deploy ASP .NET cor websites on Linux Ubuntu Server Using Nginx at Linode, and integrate the front-end with Rest Api.

testimonials.text: Hafiz Muhammad Waqar Ali had been exposing to different processes and was found diligent, hardworking, and inquisitive.
testimonials.user: Adnan Majeed CEO at Builtin Soft Pvt

testimonials.text: Very Polite, Good listner and great content. What else one should need ? I would really recommed Mr Hafiz in case if you wish to get your content done for your website!
